about_the_game:
10 DLCs included in this Season Pass will be released during the period from April 16, 2019 until the end of July 2019.
Individual release dates are as following:
- April 16, 2019 Facility Design sets
　Facility Design Set "Salburg"
　Facility Design Set "Gramnad"
　Facility Design Set "Iris"
　Facility Design Set "Mana Khemia"
　Facility Design Set "Arland"
　Facility Design Set "Dusk"
　Facility Design Set "Mysterious"

- April 23, 2019
　Costume Set for 37 Characters

- May 7, 2019
　Atelier 20th Anniversary "Arrange BGM pack"

- End of July 2019
　Extra Stories

As a Season Pass bonus, the following content will also be included:
Item Pack "Town Development Made Easy"

Note: Please visit the official website for more details. The release date is subject to change.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
